00019 #ifndef _IPL98_IMAGECONSTROWIT1BP_H
00020 #define _IPL98_IMAGECONSTROWIT1BP_H
00021 
00022 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include "../kernel_c/image/kernel_functions.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 class CImageConstRowIterator1bp
00038 {
00039 protected: // attributes
00041     unsigned int m_Curr;
00043         UINT8* m_Begin;
00045         unsigned int m_End;
00046 public:
00052         inline CImageConstRowIterator1bp(UINT8* pActualRow, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex);
00054         inline CImageConstRowIterator1bp& operator=(const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& It);
00057         inline CImageConstRowIterator1bp End() const;
00059         inline CImageConstRowIterator1bp& operator++() { m_Curr++; return *this; }
00061         inline CImageConstRowIterator1bp operator++(int) { CImageConstRowIterator1bp t=*this; m_Curr++; return t;}
00063         inline UINT32 operator*(){return ( (*(m_Begin+(m_Curr>>3))) & (0x80>>(m_Curr%8)) )!=0;}
00065         inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i){return ( (*(m_Begin+((m_Curr+i)>>3))) & (0x80>>((m_Curr+i)%8)) )!=0;}
00068         inline friend bool operator==(const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& q);
00071         inline friend bool operator!=(const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& q);
00074         inline friend bool operator< (const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& q);
00075 };
00076 
00077 inline CImageConstRowIterator1bp::CImageConstRowIterator1bp(UINT8* pActualRow, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex):
00078                 m_End(MaxIndex), m_Curr(StartIndex%8), m_Begin(pActualRow+(StartIndex>>3))
00079 {
00080 }
00081 
00082 inline CImageConstRowIterator1bp& CImageConstRowIterator1bp::operator=(const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& It)
00083 {
00084         m_Curr  = It.m_Curr;
00085         m_Begin = It.m_Begin;
00086         m_End   = It.m_End;
00087         return *this;
00088 }
00089 
00090 inline CImageConstRowIterator1bp CImageConstRowIterator1bp::End() const
00091 {
00092         CImageConstRowIterator1bp t = *this;
00093         t.m_Curr = m_End;
00094         return t;
00095 }
00096 
00097 inline bool operator==(const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& q)
00098 {
00099         return (p.m_Curr==q.m_Curr);
00100 }
00101 
00102 inline bool operator!=(const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& q)
00103 {
00104         return !(p==q);
00105 }
00106 
00107 inline bool operator<(const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageConstRowIterator1bp& q)
00108 {
00109         return (p.m_Curr<q.m_Curr);
00110 }
00111 
00112 } // end namespace ipl
